SENT.plain: Although hematuria has been reported in children with Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome, it is a rare presentation in the adult population
Two cases of massive hematuria in adults with Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome are reported here
A unique feature was venous malformations of the bladder which were responsible for massive recurrent bleeding in 1 patient
The clinical presentation and management are discussed
Conservative endoscopic and arteriographic control seems to be appropriate as initial management in these patients
